Name: Read Directory
Description: The 'Read Directory' tool prints the structure of a directory in a tree-like format. It visually represents folders and files, and you can specify how deep the structure should be printed.
Instruction: The 'read_directory' method requires a dictionary that represents the directory structure. An optional max_depth parameter can be provided to decide how many levels deep to display the structure. By default, it goes up to 3 levels deep. Your default working directory is "./Workspace"
